sentences: Homme on meil jüripäev, ostsime uue korteri.
context: The word 'töökoha' is a compound Estonian noun consisting of 'töö' (work) and 'koha' (place/position). It refers to the physical location where work takes place or a job position in general. The dictionary context shows it's used in relation to changing jobs ('töökoha muutmise kohta'). In everyday usage, it can refer to both a specific workplace location or an employment position more broadly.
